title: Peter Sloan
deck:
I’m married to the wonderful Nina, and we have 3 small and energetic children, Rachel, Hannah & Nathanael. Originally from Plymouth, I grew up in missions travelling the world. I'm now a teacher at a local secondary school.

I have a degree in theology and have a passion for teaching the Bible. I’m also a big sports fanatic and love movies (especially Star Wars and Marvel).

At Gateway I lead a Lifegroup, and I preach and teach whenever the opportunity arises.
titleRole: Lifegroup Leader, Cluster Leader and Preaching Team
